answers.answer: Hi there...sorry to hear of you moms relapse.... you say she was <15 at week 24 ,however do you know at what week she became Undetected,as that is important to the overall success of treatment?.Your mom should be under the care of a Hepatologist or a knowlegable G.I(in the treatment of HCV) if she is not already...to consider treating again with possibly some changes made.Good luck....and welcomeWill

question: Hi! My mom (age 58 with diabetes underwent a 24week combi of pegasus and ribavirin, her virus count before the course was 136656 and after 24weeks of course it showed <15 but now after 6 months its come back again with a count of 780. all the while she was on veg diet and very careful with her health.I am very confused and worried, what should i do now? i am planning to change the doctor, someone please help me.is someone here who has comeout of this and how? please guide us.
title: Hepatitis C 3a
